verses.verse: These <WH428> also are the generations<WH8435> of Aaron<WH175> and Moses<WH4872> in the day<WH3117> that the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> with<WH854> Moses<WH4872> in mount<WH2022> Sinai.<WH5514>
And these<WH428> are the names<WH8034> of the sons<WH1121> of Aaron;<WH175> Nadab<WH5070> the firstborn,<WH1060> and Abihu,<WH30> Eleazar,<WH499> and Ithamar.<WH385>

These <WH428> are the names<WH8034> of the sons<WH1121> of Aaron,<WH175> the priests<WH3548> which were anointed,<WH4886> whom<WH834> he consecrated<WH4390> <WH3027> to minister in the priest's office.<WH3547>

And Nadab<WH5070> and Abihu<WH30> died<WH4191> before<WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> when they offered<WH7126> strange<WH2114> fire<WH784> before<WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> in the wilderness<WH4057> of Sinai,<WH5514> and they had<WH1961> no<WH3808> children:<WH1121> and Eleazar<WH499> and Ithamar<WH385> ministered in the priest's office<WH3547> in<WH5921> the sight<WH6440> of Aaron<WH175> their father.<WH1>
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
Bring the tribe of Levi near,<WH7126> <WH853> <WH4294> <WH3878> and present<WH5975> them before<WH6440> Aaron<WH175> the priest,<WH3548> that they may minister<WH8334> unto him.

And they shall keep<WH8104> <WH853> his charge,<WH4931> and the charge<WH4931> of the whole<WH3605> congregation<WH5712> before<WH6440> the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> to do<WH5647> <WH853> the service<WH5656> of the tabernacle.<WH4908>

And they shall keep<WH8104> <WH853> all<WH3605> the instruments<WH3627> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> and the charge<WH4931> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> to do<WH5647> <WH853> the service<WH5656> of the tabernacle.<WH4908>

And thou shalt give<WH5414> <WH853> the Levites<WH3881> unto Aaron<WH175> and to his sons:<WH1121> they<WH1992> are wholly given<WH5414> <WH5414> unto him out of<WH4480> <WH854> the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

And thou shalt appoint<WH6485> Aaron<WH175> and his sons,<WH1121> and they shall wait on<WH8104> <WH853> their priest's office:<WH3550> and the stranger<WH2114> that cometh nigh<WH7131> shall be put to death.<WH4191>
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

And I,<WH589> behold,<WH2009> I have taken<WH3947> <WH853> the Levites<WH3881> from among<WH4480> <WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> instead of<WH8478> all<WH3605> the firstborn<WH1060> that openeth<WH6363> the matrix<WH7358> among the children<WH4480> <WH1121> of Israel:<WH3478> therefore the Levites<WH3881> shall be<WH1961> mine;

Because <WH3588> all<WH3605> the firstborn<WH1060> are mine; for on the day<WH3117> that I smote<WH5221> all<WH3605> the firstborn<WH1060> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> I hallowed<WH6942> unto me all<WH3605> the firstborn<WH1060> in Israel,<WH3478> both man<WH4480> <WH120> and<WH5704> beast:<WH929> mine shall they be:<WH1961> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses<WH4872> in the wilderness<WH4057> of Sinai,<WH5514> saying,<WH559>

Number <WH6485> <WH853> the children<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878> after the house<WH1004> of their fathers,<WH1> by their families:<WH4940> every<WH3605> male<WH2145> from a month<WH2320> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward<WH4605> shalt thou number<WH6485> them.
And Moses<WH4872> numbered<WH6485> them according to<WH5921> the word<WH6310> of the LORD,<WH3068> as<WH834> he was commanded.<WH6680>
And these<WH428> were<WH1961> the sons<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878> by their names;<WH8034> Gershon,<WH1648> and Kohath,<WH6955> and Merari.<WH4847>
And these<WH428> are the names<WH8034> of the sons<WH1121> of Gershon<WH1648> by their families;<WH4940> Libni,<WH3845> and Shimei.<WH8096>
And the sons<WH1121> of Kohath<WH6955> by their families;<WH4940> Amram,<WH6019> and Izehar,<WH3324> Hebron,<WH2275> and Uzziel.<WH5816>

And the sons<WH1121> of Merari<WH4847> by their families;<WH4940> Mahli,<WH4249> and Mushi.<WH4187> These<WH428> are the families<WH4940> of the Levites<WH3881> according to the house<WH1004> of their fathers.<WH1>
Of Gershon<WH1648> was the family<WH4940> of the Libnites,<WH3846> and the family<WH4940> of the Shimites:<WH8097> these<WH428> are the families<WH4940> of the Gershonites.<WH1649>

Those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, according to the number<WH4557> of all<WH3605> the males,<WH2145> from a month<WH2320> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> even those that were numbered<WH6485> of them were seven<WH7651> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred.<WH3967>
The families<WH4940> of the Gershonites<WH1649> shall pitch<WH2583> behind<WH310> the tabernacle<WH4908> westward.<WH3220>
And the chief<WH5387> of the house<WH1004> of the father<WH1> of the Gershonites<WH1649> shall be Eliasaph<WH460> the son<WH1121> of Lael.<WH3815>

And the charge<WH4931> of the sons<WH1121> of Gershon<WH1647> in the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150> shall be the tabernacle,<WH4908> and the tent,<WH168> the covering<WH4372> thereof, and the hanging<WH4539> for the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150>

And the hangings<WH7050> of the court,<WH2691> and the curtain<WH4539> for the door<WH6607> of the court,<WH2691> which<WH834> is by<WH5921> the tabernacle,<WH4908> and by<WH5921> the altar<WH4196> round about,<WH5439> and the cords<WH4340> of it for all<WH3605> the service<WH5656> thereof.

And of Kohath<WH6955> was the family<WH4940> of the Amramites,<WH6020> and the family<WH4940> of the Izeharites,<WH3325> and the family<WH4940> of the Hebronites,<WH2276> and the family<WH4940> of the Uzzielites:<WH5817> these<WH428> are the families<WH4940> of the Kohathites.<WH6956>

In the number<WH4557> of all<WH3605> the males,<WH2145> from a month<WH2320> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> were eight<WH8083> thousand<WH505> and six<WH8337> hundred,<WH3967> keeping<WH8104> the charge<WH4931> of the sanctuary.<WH6944>
The families<WH4940> of the sons<WH1121> of Kohath<WH6955> shall pitch<WH2583> on<WH5921> the side<WH3409> of the tabernacle<WH4908> southward.<WH8486>
And the chief<WH5387> of the house<WH1004> of the father<WH1> of the families<WH4940> of the Kohathites<WH6956> shall be Elizaphan<WH469> the son<WH1121> of Uzziel.<WH5816>

And their charge<WH4931> shall be the ark,<WH727> and the table,<WH7979> and the candlestick,<WH4501> and the altars,<WH4196> and the vessels<WH3627> of the sanctuary<WH6944> wherewith<WH834> they minister,<WH8334> and the hanging,<WH4539> and all<WH3605> the service<WH5656> thereof.

And Eleazar<WH499> the son<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548> shall be chief<WH5387> over the chief<WH5387> of the Levites,<WH3881> and have the oversight<WH6486> of them that keep<WH8104> the charge<WH4931> of the sanctuary.<WH6944>
Of Merari<WH4847> was the family<WH4940> of the Mahlites,<WH4250> and the family<WH4940> of the Mushites:<WH4188> these<WH428> are the families<WH4940> of Merari.<WH4847>

And those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, according to the number<WH4557> of all<WH3605> the males,<WH2145> from a month<WH2320> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> were six<WH8337> thousand<WH505> and two hundred.<WH3967>

And the chief<WH5387> of the house<WH1004> of the father<WH1> of the families<WH4940> of Merari<WH4847> was Zuriel<WH6700> the son<WH1121> of Abihail:<WH32> these shall pitch<WH2583> on<WH5921> the side<WH3409> of the tabernacle<WH4908> northward.<WH6828>

And under the custody<WH6486> and charge<WH4931> of the sons<WH1121> of Merari<WH4847> shall be the boards<WH7175> of the tabernacle,<WH4908> and the bars<WH1280> thereof, and the pillars<WH5982> thereof, and the sockets<WH134> thereof, and all<WH3605> the vessels<WH3627> thereof, and all<WH3605> that serveth<WH5656> thereto,
And the pillars<WH5982> of the court<WH2691> round about,<WH5439> and their sockets,<WH134> and their pins,<WH3489> and their cords.<WH4340>

But those that encamp<WH2583> before<WH6440> the tabernacle<WH4908> toward the east,<WH6924> even before<WH6440> the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150> eastward,<WH4217> shall be Moses,<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> and his sons,<WH1121> keeping<WH8104> the charge<WH4931> of the sanctuary<WH4720> for the charge<WH4931> of the children<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478> and the stranger<WH2114> that cometh nigh<WH7131> shall be put to death.<WH4191>

All <WH3605> that were numbered<WH6485> of the Levites,<WH3881> which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> numbered<WH6485> at<WH5921> the commandment<WH6310> of the LORD,<WH3068> throughout their families,<WH4940> all<WH3605> the males<WH2145> from a month<WH2320> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> were twenty<WH6242> and two<WH8147> thousand.<WH505>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> Number<WH6485> all<WH3605> the firstborn<WH1060> of the males<WH2145> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> from a month<WH2320> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> and take<WH5375> <WH853> the number<WH4557> of their names.<WH8034>

And thou shalt take<WH3947> <WH853> the Levites<WH3881> for me (I<WH589> am the LORD)<WH3068> instead of<WH8478> all<WH3605> the firstborn<WH1060> among the children<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478> and the cattle<WH929> of the Levites<WH3881> instead of<WH8478> all<WH3605> the firstlings<WH1060> among the cattle<WH929> of the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>
And Moses<WH4872> numbered,<WH6485> as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> him,<WH853> all<WH3605> the firstborn<WH1060> among the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

And all<WH3605> the firstborn<WH1060> males<WH2145> by the number<WH4557> of names,<WH8034> from a month<WH2320> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> of those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, were<WH1961> twenty<WH6242> and two<WH8147> thousand<WH505> two hundred<WH3967> and threescore and thirteen.<WH7969> <WH7657>
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

Take <WH3947> <WH853> the Levites<WH3881> instead of<WH8478> all<WH3605> the firstborn<WH1060> among the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and the cattle<WH929> of the Levites<WH3881> instead of<WH8478> their cattle;<WH929> and the Levites<WH3881> shall be<WH1961> mine: I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

And for those that are to be redeemed<WH6299> of the two hundred<WH3967> and threescore and thirteen<WH7969> <WH7657> of the firstborn<WH4480> <WH1060> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> which are more<WH5736> than<WH5921> the Levites;<WH3881>

Thou shalt even take<WH3947> five shekels apiece<WH2568> <WH2568> <WH8255> by the poll,<WH1538> after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary<WH6944> shalt thou take<WH3947> them: (the shekel<WH8255> is twenty<WH6242> gerahs: )<WH1626>
And thou shalt give<WH5414> the money,<WH3701> wherewith the odd number<WH5736> of them is to be redeemed,<WH6299> unto Aaron<WH175> and to his sons.<WH1121>
And Moses<WH4872> took<WH3947> the redemption<WH6306> <WH853> money<WH3701> of<WH4480> <WH854> them that were over<WH5736> and above<WH5921> them that were redeemed<WH6306> by the Levites: <WH3881>

Of <WH4480> <WH854> the firstborn<WH1060> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> took<WH3947> he<WH853> the money;<WH3701> a thousand<WH505> three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> and threescore<WH8346> and five<WH2568> shekels, after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary: <WH6944>

And Moses<WH4872> gave<WH5414> <WH853> the money<WH3701> of them that were redeemed<WH6306> unto Aaron<WH175> and to his sons,<WH1121> according to<WH5921> the word<WH6310> of the LORD,<WH3068> as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> <WH853> Moses.<WH4872>
